subject: Discovery Call
description: Had detailed discussion about enterprise requirements. Very positive response.

subject: Demo Follow-up
description: Sent demo recording and next steps. Requested technical requirements.

subject: Stakeholder Meeting
description: Meeting with IT team and decision makers. Addressed technical questions.

subject: Send Proposal
description: Prepare and send customized proposal based on requirements gathering.

subject: Proposal Update
description: Updated proposal with revised pricing structure as requested.
